metadata.title: CVE-2020-12768 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.6.svm_cpu_uninit in arch/x86/kvm/svm.c has a memory leak, akaCID-d80b64ff297e. NOTE: third parties dispute this issue because it's aone-time leak at the boot, the size is negligible, and it can't betriggered at will.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
